pullrequest.title: Adding GameState class and tests to default branch

content.raw: Shouldn't be easier to pass an additional parameter of type `Team::Side` to all the class constructors that are used on both teams (left and right)? We could change the `name` member variable without breaking anything and the code will be simpler because you probably wouldn't need this `if/else`.
content.html: Shouldn't be easier to pass an additional parameter of type Team::Side to all the class constructors that are used on both teams (left and right)? We could change the name member variable without breaking anything and the code will be simpler because you probably wouldn't need this if/else.
